title: Parabola Calculator – standard, vertex, 3 points, focus & directrix

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Standard form: \( y = ax^2 + bx + c \) Vertex form: \( y = a(x - h)^2 + k \) Focus-directrix form: \( (x - h)^2 = 4p (y - k) \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( h = -\frac{b}{2a}, \quad k = f(h) = a h^2 + b h + c \)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: If \( y = a(x - h)^2 + k \), then \( p = \frac{1}{4a} \) Focus: \( (h, k + p) \) Directrix: \( y = k - p \)
